verses.verse: At that <WH1931> time <WH6256> the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Hew <WH6458> thee two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first, <WH7223> and come up <WH5927> unto <WH413> me into the mount, <WH2022> and make <WH6213> thee an ark <WH727> of wood. <WH6086>

And I will write <WH3789> on <WH5921> the tables <WH3871> <WH853> the words <WH1697> that <WH834> were <WH1961> in <WH5921> the first <WH7223> tables <WH3871> which <WH834> thou didst break, <WH7665> and thou shalt put <WH7760> them in the ark. <WH727>

And I made <WH6213> an ark <WH727> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and hewed <WH6458> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first, <WH7223> and went up <WH5927> into the mount, <WH2022> having the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> in mine hand. <WH3027>

And he wrote <WH3789> on <WH5921> the tables, <WH3871> according to the first <WH7223> writing, <WH4385> <WH853> the ten <WH6235> commandments, <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> you in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly: <WH6951> and the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> them unto <WH413> me.

And I turned myself <WH6437> and came down <WH3381> from <WH4480> the mount, <WH2022> and put <WH7760> <WH853> the tables <WH3871> in the ark <WH727> which <WH834> I had made; <WH6213> and there <WH8033> they be, <WH1961> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> me.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took their journey <WH5265> from Beeroth <WH4480> <WH881> of the children <WH1121> of Jaakan <WH3292> to Mosera: <WH4149> there <WH8033> Aaron <WH175> died, <WH4191> and there <WH8033> he was buried; <WH6912> and Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121> ministered in the priest's office <WH3547> in his stead. <WH8478>
From thence <WH4480> <WH8033> they journeyed <WH5265> unto Gudgodah; <WH1412> and from <WH4480> Gudgodah <WH1412> to Jotbath, <WH3193> a land <WH776> of rivers <WH5158> of waters. <WH4325>

At that <WH1931> time <WH6256> the LORD <WH3068> separated <WH914> <WH853> the tribe <WH7626> of Levi, <WH3878> to bear <WH5375> <WH853> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD, <WH3068> to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> to minister <WH8334> unto him, and to bless <WH1288> in his name, <WH8034> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> Levi <WH3878> hath <WH1961> no <WH3808> part <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with <WH5973> his brethren; <WH251> the LORD <WH3068> is his inheritance, <WH5159> according <WH834> as the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> promised <WH1696> him.

And I <WH595> stayed <WH5975> in the mount, <WH2022> according to the first <WH7223> time, <WH3117> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights; <WH3915> and the LORD <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> unto <WH413> me at that <WH1931> time <WH6471> also, <WH1571> and the LORD <WH3068> would <WH14> not <WH3808> destroy <WH7843> thee.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> me, Arise, <WH6965> take <WH1980> thy journey <WH4550> before <WH6440> the people, <WH5971> that they may go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land, <WH776> which <WH834> I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> unto them.

And now, <WH6258> Israel, <WH3478> what <WH4100> doth the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> require <WH7592> of <WH4480> <WH5973> thee, but <WH3588> <WH518> to fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in all <WH3605> his ways, <WH1870> and to love <WH157> him, and to serve <WH5647> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with all <WH3605> thy heart <WH3824> and with all <WH3605> thy soul, <WH5315>
To keep <WH8104> <WH853> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD, <WH3068> and his statutes, <WH2708> which <WH834> I <WH595> command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117> for thy good? <WH2896>
Behold, <WH2005> the heaven <WH8064> and the heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064> is the LORD's <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> the earth <WH776> also, with all <WH3605> that <WH834> therein is.

Only <WH7535> the LORD <WH3068> had a delight <WH2836> in thy fathers <WH1> to love <WH157> them, and he chose <WH977> their seed <WH2233> after <WH310> them, even you above all <WH4480> <WH3605> people, <WH5971> as it is this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
Circumcise <WH4135> therefore <WH853> the foreskin <WH6190> of your heart, <WH3824> and be no <WH3808> more <WH5750> stiffnecked. <WH6203> <WH7185>

For <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430> is God <WH430> of gods, <WH430> and Lord <WH113> of lords, <WH113> a great <WH1419> God, <WH410> a mighty, <WH1368> and a terrible, <WH3372> which <WH834> regardeth <WH5375> not <WH3808> persons, <WH6440> nor <WH3808> taketh <WH3947> reward: <WH7810>
He doth execute <WH6213> the judgment <WH4941> of the fatherless <WH3490> and widow, <WH490> and loveth <WH157> the stranger, <WH1616> in giving <WH5414> him food <WH3899> and raiment. <WH8071>
Love <WH157> ye therefore <WH853> the stranger: <WH1616> for <WH3588> ye were <WH1961> strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
Thou shalt fear <WH3372> <WH853> the LORD <WH3068> thy God; <WH430> him shalt thou serve, <WH5647> and to him shalt thou cleave, <WH1692> and swear <WH7650> by his name. <WH8034>

He <WH1931> is thy praise, <WH8416> and he <WH1931> is thy God, <WH430> that <WH834> hath done <WH6213> for <WH854> thee <WH853> these <WH428> great <WH1419> and terrible things, <WH3372> which <WH834> thine eyes <WH5869> have seen. <WH7200>

Thy fathers <WH1> went down <WH3381> into Egypt <WH4714> with threescore and ten <WH7657> persons; <WH5315> and now <WH6258> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath made <WH7760> thee as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude. <WH7230>
